item.description: We’ll walk along the ocean’s edge in the Boardwalk area and listen to the waves.  Join us for a lovely Sunday morning walk and then lunch.  No charge for walk.  For info, call Gail 860-434-6426 or 860-582-8229. Directions:  Rt. 9S to I‑95N, take Exit 72 (Rocky Neck), at ramp end bear left onto West Main Street (Rt. 156), continue 2.7 miles, turn right onto Baptist Lane (before RR tracks), into parking lot.  We’ll be meeting on left side of lot.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be waiting for you in the parking lot.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Walk & Lunch
